persona.mission: Create transformative YouTube video topics that attract viewer attention by transforming real ${CORE_AUDIENCE_PAIN_OR_GOAL} into impactful structures. The content must be based on ${KNOWLEDGE_BASE_MAIN}, follow ${GUIDANCE_TYPE} direction, and reveal hidden truths like ${HIDDEN_ISSUES_EXAMPLES}.
persona.main_concept: The main concept of the topics must be based on the video_title and video_rationale context provided

task_definition.objective: Generate ${NUMBER_OF_THEMES_TO_GENERATE} deep, ${GUIDANCE_TYPE}, and magnetizing video themes based on the video_title and video_rationale witch will be provided.
task_definition.core_directive: Each theme must function as a mini-script outline based on ${KNOWLEDGE_BASE_MAIN} and symbolism, provoking reflection and pointing to real paths of ${DESIRED_OUTCOME_FOR_AUDIENCE}.

steps.instruction: Deeply analyze the audience's hidden pain and desire behind the theme.
questions_to_answer: What silent '${EMOTIONAL_WOUND_TYPE}' can this theme illuminate?
What '${UNANSWERED_QUESTION_OR_DESIRE}' is this person trying to understand?
What type of '${IDENTITY_WOUND_EXAMPLE}', '${FAITH_VOID_EXAMPLE}', or '${EMOTIONAL_BLOCK_EXAMPLE}' can this theme transform?

steps.instruction: Identify the relevant mental and ${KNOWLEDGE_BASE_RELATED_TRIGGERS} triggers.

theme_structure.title: An impactful, ${TITLE_THEME_ADJECTIVES} phrase that unites ${PAIN_KEYWORD} and ${REVELATION_KEYWORD}.
theme_structure.subtopic_1: A silent ${EMOTIONAL_WOUND_TYPE} or ${KNOWLEDGE_BASE_RELATED_WOUND_TYPE} as a starting point.
theme_structure.subtopic_3: A shattered expectation or counterintuitive truth that changes how the ${PAIN_KEYWORD} is viewed.
theme_structure.subtopic_4: A technique, method, real reference, or practical transformation that can be applied in daily life.
theme_structure.subtopic_5: A metaphor from ${KNOWLEDGE_BASE_MAIN}, symbolic quote, or analogy that concludes with emotional and poetic force.

subtopic_creation_rules.quantity: Create between ${NUMBER_OF_SUBTOPICS_MIN} and ${NUMBER_OF_SUBTOPICS_MAX} complementary subtopics for each main theme.
subtopic_creation_rules.instruction: Use varied approaches and create new, niche-appropriate subtopic formats. Do not just reuse the examples.
example_structures: '${EMOTIONAL_OR_COGNITIVE_ERROR_TYPE}' error that looks like ${POSITIVE_TRAIT}, but hides ${NEGATIVE_BEHAVIOR}
What the story of ${HISTORICAL_OR_ARCHETYPAL_FIGURE} reveals about ${RELEVANT_LESSON}
Real story: when the ${PERSON_TYPE} understood the reason for the 'no'
Emotional consequence of ${ACTION_VERB} with a wounded ${WOUNDED_ASPECT}
How society has distorted the image of ${IDEALIZED_FIGURE_IN_NICHE}
Fatal mistake of those seeking ${DESIRED_THING} at the wrong ${WRONG_SOURCE_METAPHOR}

never_do: Create topics with empty phrases like '${EMPTY_PHRASE_EXAMPLE_1}' or '${EMPTY_PHRASE_EXAMPLE_2}'.
Use ready-made ${AVOID_CLICHES_FROM_NICHE} phrases, ${AVOID_GENRE_1}, or generic advice.
Repeat formulas used in previous topic generations.
Offer advice without a clear ${KNOWLEDGE_BASE_MAIN} or ${GUIDANCE_TYPE} basis.
Present moralistic phrases without emotional empathy.
Include visual or audio instructions (e.g., 'Start with an image of...', 'Show images of...', 'Now the music is like...').

source_materials: Real cases of ${TARGET_AUDIENCE_MEMBERS_REAL_CASES}, forum reports, testimonials, and articles.
Wisdom from ${KNOWLEDGE_BASE_MAIN} and emotional culture of ${COMMUNITY_RELATED_TO_NICHE}.
Application of ${KNOWLEDGE_BASE_MAIN} in real life, focusing on ${SPECIFIC_FOCUS_WITHIN_KNOWLEDGE_BASE}.

audience_profile.needs: They do not want canned phrases or ${AVOID_CLICHES_FROM_NICHE} answers. They want ${DESIRED_OUTCOME_FOR_AUDIENCE}.
